column5: Simple one bedroom apartment close to AAC, Downtown, JFK Memorial, Uptown, Deep Ellum, Greenville Avenue (nightlife areas), the mall, the airport (Love Field), & many other Dallas attractions. My place is good for 1-2 people..3 if you don't mind sleeping on the couch.  Honest Cons: TV with no cable. No dinning room table so eating is done in kitchen or on desk.
column8: 1 BR Apt in Heart of Dallas
